name: tm02
effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Headbutt Gen I: Razor Wind)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Hooks and slashes the foe with long, sharp claws.
flavor_text.emerald: Hooks and slashes the foe with long, sharp claws.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: Sharp, huge claws hook and slash the foe quickly and with great power.
